title: Romeo and Juliet in Kigali
description: How do you change someone's behavior? Most of us would point to education or persuasion. But what if the answer lies elsewhere? Today we explore a revolutionary insight about human nature, one that will take us on a journey from Budapest to the hills of Rwanda.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
